name: The Fishing Cabin
description:
You are a Polar Bear named Chonk, who's pretty much introverted. Dragged out by Paddington to just go out fishing, you enjoy the scenery and the people around you.

TEAM:

Lead Programmer: Mio Jalosjos

Programmers: Mio Jalosjos, Andrew Cusi

QA: Leynard Melad

Character Assets: Patricia Reburiano

UI Assets: Mio Jalosjos

Music: Mio Jalosjos

Assets and Additional Sounds

Seasonal Tilesets by GrafxKid

Magic Cliffs Pixel Art Environment by Ansimuz

Free Fishing Pixel Art Pack by Craftpix.net

Oak Woods by brullov

Birds Chirping by Trendy Sound Effects

Lake Sound Effect by Sounds and Music Library

Fishing Minigame by Evan Williams
